column4: in "man stat" or "stat somefile" what is the difference between "Time of last modification"/"Modify:" and "Time of last change"/"Change:"?
I *think*, but not totally sure, that modifications also can be changes on file attributes (ownership, permissions). Changes must be actual writes to file
It's actually the opposite (I tried. changing file attributes are "changes" editing file contents is "modification")
right, rename does not "modify" file but is also a "change"
